channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Here’s what may have triggered Trump’s latest jibe that Canada is a state

item.title: Macy's Bargain Shares Tempt Activists Again
item.description: The newest arrivals at Macy’s have a fresh idea and some tired ones.

item.title: Behind Bitcoin's Rally Is a Simple Fact: Supplies Are Limited
item.description: Bulls argue that the token’s scarcity will fuel rising prices, with buyers scrambling to acquire the last new coins to come online.

item.title: Now You Can Avoid Taxes Like the Rich and Famous
item.description: Technology such as AI widens access to tax-optimization strategies, including the launch of funds that explicitly seek to defer tax payments.

item.title: TSMC posts 34% surge in November sales in sign of ongoing AI boom
item.description: TSMC’s sales have surged over the past two years on the back of booming demand for advanced microchips following the launch of ChatGPT in Nov. 2022

item.title: My husband and I have lived in my house for 17 years. Should I finally add him to the deed?

item.title: Europe's Gas Price Eases on Milder, Windy Weather Forecast

item.title: ‘She is single and has a low-wage job’: I want to give my daughter, who is in her 30s, $50,000 for retirement. What could go wrong?
item.description: “She can invest aggressively, as she has over two decades to see her principal grow.”
